title: CS Competency Practical Enhancement: Blended Learning-Based Intensive Short-Term East Asian Music Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic playing techniques of the three major traditional East Asian musical instruments (gayageum, geomungo, haegeum) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can compare structural features (rhythmic patterns, scales, harmonies) of Korean, Chinese, and Japanese traditional music and explain them in approximately 1,500 characters.
Learners can form PBL teams to develop and present a 3-minute original performance piece incorporating East Asian musical elements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
